text: What weapons should you be using to
absolutely [ __ ] with each class? You can
look at each character scalings in the
visual codeex menu and every weapon's
scalings in the training rounds. The
Duchess, the executor, and Aronai
benefit the most out of the exterity
weapons such as thrusting swords, curb
swords, daggers, bows, katanas, and
reapers. The duchess also has an a
scaling in intelligence, making her a
nice spellblade class. John, my raider
want to be using big bunks all the time,
such as great hammers, great axes,
colossal swords, and colossal weapons.
No.
She benefits the most from seals with
good incantations and weapons that have
big fate scaling such as her claws, the
cipher pa and the coded sword. Chocolate
twin moons can also use these as well as
powerful magic spells. The one who kind
of sucks balls is better person because
he doesn't have any big scalings on
anything. This doesn't mean that be or
lower scaling weapons are useless
though. It's just a guideline for
maximum [ __ ]
